light_name = 'light_1', expect_status = 3

    def check_update_ota_status(self, light_name, expect_status):
        topic = self.cloud_mqtt_cmd.create_topic_from_light(light_name)
        start_time = datetime.datetime.now()
        bl_loop = True
        while bl_loop:
            for mqtt_client in self.list_mqtt_client:
                rcv_topic, rcv_msg = mqtt_client.get_subscribe_topic_message()
                if topic == rcv_topic:
                    if rcv_msg["method"] == "updateOta":
                        print(rcv_msg)
                        res_status = int(rcv_msg["params"]["updateStatus"])
                        if int(rcv_msg["params"]["updateStatus"]) == expect_status:
                            mqtt_client.clear_subscribe_topic_message()
                            bl_loop = False
                            break
                        else:
                            mqtt_client.clear_subscribe_topic_message()
                            assert False, "Error : check ota status fail! Should be " + str(expect_status) \
>                                         + ", but was " + str(res_status)
